title: 20 Years Of Nuclear Blast (4CD) Various Artists heavy metal
description:
Released on: 2007-12-07

Forget everything you have ever learned about compilations! This 4-CD package is ultimate one. 20 Years of NUCLEAR BLAST, 70 songs in more than 300 minutes of mind-blasting metal from the NB-roster. From DIMMU BORGIR, NIGHTWISH, HAMMERFALL, BLIND GUARDIAN, EDGUY, SUBWAY TO SALLY to former NB acts like PYOGENSIS, CREMATORY, PUNGENTSTENCH, FARMER BOYS, DESTRUCTION. Definitely suitable for every taste of metalheads. HappyBirthday, NUCLEAR BLAST!
